description: This beautifully updated 3 bedroom, 2 bath end-unit townhouse offers over 1,030 sqft of comfortable living in a peaceful, community-oriented complex. Step inside to find a bright, open-concept main floor featuring a spacious living & dining area, warm laminate flooring, & large windows that bring in natural light. The modern kitchen is well-equipped with updated appliances & ample cabinet space, opening to a private, fenced patio - perfect for morning coffee, bbq’s, or letting kids & pets play safely. Upstairs, you’ll find three generous bedrooms, including a primary suite with great closet space and a feature wall. Enjoy the convenience of two parking spots, in-suite laundry, & private backyard.
